Undying Vanguard.name: Undying Vanguard
Undying Vanguard.flavor: For a moment, your mind slips back into memories of a past life, and you adopt a fighting style forged across hundreds of deaths.
Undying Vanguard.effect: You enter the unyielding vanguard stance. Until the stance ends, you cannot be subjected to forced movement unless you choose, you do not grant combat advantage, you automatically reduce all ongoing damage to 0, and you are immune to the auras of your enemies if you choose to be.
